locations.name: Children's Discovery Museum
locations.parentQuote: just as fantastic a visit (minus the incredible scenery). Hardly a hidden gem but somewhat under-appreciated

locations.name: Lawrence Hall of Science
locations.parentQuote: when kiddo's a little older

locations.name: Adventure Playground
locations.parentQuote: My kids adored that place and despite my worries, never got injured
locations.insiderTips: Age 5+ for tools, zip line 6+. Called 'Tetanus Park'

locations.name: CuriOdyssey
locations.address: 401 El Camino Real, San Mateo, CA 94401
locations.parentQuote: perfect for this age. Kids can run around and don't have to worry
locations.insiderTips: Perfect for 2.5-3yo. Combine with Magic Mountain + beach

locations.name: 22nd Street Caltrain Adventure
locations.parentQuote: drive to 22nd Caltrain stop, take train to San Mateo for lunch. Train ride alone is total adventure and sun comes out down there!
locations.insiderTips: Sun comes out in San Mateo! Train ride is main attraction

locations.name: Hayward Japanese Gardens
locations.parentQuote: for a quick stroll and seeing the fish and turtles in the pond
locations.insiderTips: Quick visit, perfect for short attention spans

locations.name: Happy Hollow
locations.parentQuote: literal favorite place as a kid. mysterious broke down attractions and oddities were enthralling
locations.insiderTips: Perfect for toddler to 8yr range. Has mysterious unfinished charm

locations.name: Ardenwood Farms
locations.parentQuote: so much for kiddos to do and experience there!

locations.name: Tilden Steam Train
locations.parentQuote: always a winner. ride through the redwoods!
locations.insiderTips: Combine with Little Farm and Merry-go-round for full day

locations.name: Tilden Little Farm
locations.parentQuote: sweet and fun for Littles to bigger Littles
locations.insiderTips: Recently banned feeding animals. Very small - 30min walkthrough

locations.name: Tilden Merry-go-Round
locations.parentQuote: Adding Tilden Merry Go Round

locations.name: Multi-Transit Adventure Loop
locations.parentQuote: take Caltrain to SF, trolley to pier, lunch at ferry building, ferry to Alameda and Oakland
locations.insiderTips: Perfect for mixed ages. Almost every transit method in one day

locations.name: Oakland Zoo
locations.parentQuote: Not lesser known but great. Members means don't feel bad if bail after 20min

locations.name: SF Zoo
locations.parentQuote: take our 2.5yo all the time. Got membership. Safe for runners
locations.insiderTips: Good for toddler runners, big playground

locations.name: Holly Park
locations.address: Highland Ave & Holly Park Cir, SF
locations.parentQuote: perfect for this age. Kids can run around and don't have to worry
locations.insiderTips: Perfect for 2.5yo. Part of parent's favs rotation

locations.name: 22nd Street Park, Dogpatch
locations.parentQuote: the little park on 22nd in the Dogpatch because perfect for this age

locations.name: East Bay Regional Parks
locations.parentQuote: has a metric ton of locations
locations.insiderTips: Roberts Park play structure is amazing

locations.name: Mia's Dream Come True Playground
locations.parentQuote: Really solid place for ages 2-5
locations.insiderTips: All-access park for kids, nice spots of shade for picnic

locations.name: Presidio Tunnel Tops
locations.parentQuote: absolutely incredibly designed spaces for kids, and they are free!

locations.name: Presidio Field Station
locations.parentQuote: absolutely incredibly designed spaces for kids, and they are free!

locations.name: Train Town Sonoma
locations.parentQuote: great for the little ones
locations.insiderTips: Go Tuesday for Tuesday night market combo in town square

locations.name: Santa Cruz Library + Beach
locations.parentQuote: park by library and walk to beach, if that's still possible

locations.name: Cull Canyon Lagoon
locations.address: Cull Canyon Rd, Castro Valley, CA
locations.parentQuote: I came here to suggest Cull Canyon!
locations.insiderTips: Don Castro nearby sometimes less crowded

locations.name: Don Castro Regional Park
locations.parentQuote: sometimes a little less crowded than Cull Canyon
locations.insiderTips: Alternative when Cull Canyon is busy

locations.name: Fitzgerald Marine Reserve
locations.parentQuote: Pick a day with negative tide
locations.insiderTips: NOT safe for toddlers - very slippery on reef

locations.parentQuote: buy cheapest ticket, ride tram between terminals, watch planes

locations.parentQuote: Gilroy Gardens for the splash pads
